name: Flooring Team
description: Flooring Team Company is a full-service flooring company specializing in the installation of high-quality Hardwood, Laminate, Tile, Carpet and cabinetry. Located at 2048 N 16th St, Phoenix, AZ 85006, we proudly serve Phoenix, Dallas, El Paso, Denver, Las Vegas, and beyond throughout the Southwestern United States with expert craftsmanship and reliable service.
